meanings.definition: A very large number or amount
meanings.sent1: There were thousands of stars in the night sky.
meanings.sent2: She saved thousands of dollars for her dream vacation.
meanings.sent3: The bakery sold thousands of donuts in just one hour!
meanings.sent4: The news spread like wildfire, reaching thousands of eager ears.
meanings.sent5: The field was filled with thousands of colorful flowers, creating a breathtaking sight.

meanings.definition: An unspecified large number or amount
meanings.sent1: He had thousands of reasons to smile every day.
meanings.sent2: The library had thousands of books waiting to be read.
meanings.sent3: The magician pulled out thousands of scarves from his hat!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the room, reaching thousands of hearts.
meanings.sent5: The old tree stood tall, its branches home to thousands of chirping birds.
